title: Bedtime Story for Adults
description:
Enjoy a relaxing bedtime story about a woman named Lily and her cozy bakery. This episode is made in collaboration with Get Sleepy, the #1 bedtime story podcast. Simply press play as you lay down in bed, close your eyes, and listen along as it guides you into peaceful dreams. 

Find more soothing stories just like this one on Get Sleepy: https://open.spotify.com/show/0edOBjruWV6Juxf42WjGxw.

Want access to an ad-free version of this episode? Try Deep Sleep Sounds Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepsounds.supercast.com/.

Create a mix of your favorite sounds and play it for 10+ hours by downloading the Deep Sleep Sounds App at: https://deepsleepsounds.onelink.me/U0RY/app.
